comment: Lectures for about 30-45 min before lab. Takes a while to grade but she's a very relax and easy grader. Explains stuff if you're confused. I would 100% take again.
Great Lab professor, She was super nice and super helpful when I got confused with the lab work. there is a lot of work to the chem 2 labs but she helped a lot!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework
